Articles.Content:
For the record im american i just love these planes. flies pretty good responsiveness is a little too fast but it does go where you point it. Using the retractable landing gear that came with .15

Mostly stock accept:

camera mod (cameras are placed around the aircraft) so youll need that to work it. (press F7 to scroll views)

Aviation pack that uses dumb bomb

Wing pack (triangular and rectangle wing pieces)

Bigtrak pack because it uses headlights from that. have to see at night!

C7 intake and thruster mod (whatever its called sorry for vagueness) because it also uses the tiny version of the regular sized intakes and after burners that came with .15 unless that came with i dont remember.

DOWNLOAD available look for mig.craft
